text:
Hello
I am trying to optimize my google lighthouse score, more specifically the async load of css. <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/hubl/functions#require-css|Hubl doc> mention how to import css this way (async in require_css) but I can't find a way to load a module's css asynchronously. Did I miss something ? Can it be done at all ?
There is no way to do it if you use the CSS part of a module. To do it in a module you will have to create a separate CSS file and then link it in the HTML + HubL part of the module.
